title: Matchsafe, "Serpent and Beetle", ca. 1900
markings: STERLING, maker's mark, 967, all stamped on bezel.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Oblong, with slightly asymetrical, curved sides and corners, featuring beetle on case body, framed by organic, attenuated tendrils with whiplash curves, through which a serpent, on the lid, is intertwined. Reverse features large empty reserve, framed by organic, attenuated bands. Lid hinged on side. Striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Serpent and Beetle", ca. 1900.
ca. 1900. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-1340.
